about_the_game:
Jack Cunningham is a partially blind private investigator.

Help him escape from rooms by reaching the light, rescue little kittens or recover valuable objects.

An arcade platforms in 2D game where your good memory, skill and patience will be key to completing the rooms.

You have 10 seconds to memorise the path to the light, the position of the enemies, the activation console and your objective in the special events.

When you are blind, complete everything within 60 seconds.

A game that will test your patience.

Check your progress and increase your prestige.

Complete the special events or risk playing on extreme difficulty.

Help Jack in an innovative game.

Demo Version : Only easy mode and without events.
